name: export-chart-lambda
description: Lambda Function for Tupaia Chart Export

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf dist
scripts.package-prepare: npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && yarn --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
